document_data.caption: A map of the city of Nakamaru. Note that north is to the right.
document_data.name: Nakamaru
document_data.mainbody: '''Nakamaru''' was a city in [[Wa]] known to maintain the largest quarter for the residences of foreign merchants and dignitaries.  Nakamaru was also the original home province of the [[Marasuuri family]].
document_data.History: The presence of so many [[Shou]] inhabitants in the city was because of special permission granted them by the Empress [[Bishkammon]].
document_data.Geography:
[[File:Machukara and Paikai.jpg|thumb|right|280px|''A map of northern tip of [[Tsukishima]], showing the location of Nakamaru on the east coast.'']]
It was on the coast of the northernmost province of [[Tsukishima]].
